newsitem.title: USA: AMBAC qualifies eight bond deals for insurance.
newsitem.headline: AMBAC qualifies eight bond deals for insurance.

text.p: AMBAC Indemnity Corp said Tuesday it qualified eight bond deals for insurance slated for competitive sale today.
--Pima County USD #10, Ariz., $19.3 million of school improvement bonds.
--Western Dubuque County SD, Iowa, $3.6 million of GO bonds.
--St Bernard SD #1, La., $22 million of school bonds.
--Roseau ISD #682, Minn., $8.4 million of GO school building refunding bonds.
--Cuba-Rushford CSD, N.Y., $8.2 million of school district bonds.
--Schenectady, N.Y., $10.5 million of public improvement bonds.
--West Virginia Housing $25.8 million of AMT housing bonds and $24.2 million of housing bonds.
